title: Sweet and tangy fruit salad
ingredients: ['1 small red onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '125ml freshly squeezed orange juice', '2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon grated orange zest', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '350g small cantaloupe balls', '300g seedless watermelon, cut into 1.25 cubes', '1 ripe mango, cut into 5mm cubes', '45g coriander leaves', '2 ripe avocados', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', '6 thin lime slices']
